title: When I'm Back at a Keyboard
alt: [after typing 1,500 words on feathered dinosaurs, paleontology, sexism, lava, and dinosaurs as animals rather than movie monsters] Sorry to cut it short, I'm on my phone. When I'm back at a keyboard, I can give you another 5,000 words.
transcript:
[Cueball is walking while holding his phone in both hands. A line from the screen on the phone goes to the text above him, indicating what he writes:]
Cueball (texting): Sure, I can reply once I'm back at a keyboard and can type more easily.[Caption below the panel:]
I say this a lot for someone who routinely types thousands of words in text message conversations when someone brings up Jurassic Park.
